author: Erik Lorincz
description: The grated tonka bean adds a vanilla aroma to the surface of this drink.
name: Love me flip
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: BEAT egg yolk with sugar in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
